name: Brick Break (jbernard3396)
description:
Break some bricks
Press 'x' to restart after a gameover
highscore (on endurance) is 175

Normal: The board resets every time you clear it, slowly getting harder

Endurance: Each time you clear 12 bricks, 12 new bricks spawn

Survival: Every 5 time the ball hits your paddle, a new row spawns
